title: Virtual Library
overview: A simple digital library application built as part of The Odin Project's JavaScript Course. The project demonstrates object-oriented programming principles and DOM manipulation using vanilla JavaScript
lessons_learnt: Strengthened my undestanding of JavaScript fundamentals, including object constructors and protoypal inheritance.

title: Interactive Timeline
overview: My final-year capstone project at university. The interactive timeline allows users to explore chronological data visually and was desgined with usability and responsiveness in mind.
lessons_learnt: Gained practical experience collaborating in a team environment to build a real-world application, including version control, agile workflow, and client feedback integration.

title: MovieDB Web Application
overview: A full-stack web application developed as a university project that enables users to search for and view detailed information about movies. Inspired by platforms such as IMDb, it features a responsive UI and RESTful API integration.
lessons_learnt: My first independently developed full-stack project. It reinforced my skills in fron-tend development with React and my back-end understanding through building APIs with Node.js.
